title: Prepare Return with Itemized Deductions
description: A homeowner needs to file their return and wants to itemize deductions, including mortgage interest, state taxes, and charitable contributions.

tasks.description: Gather all necessary documentation (Form 1098, property tax bills, donation receipts).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all required documents from the taxpayer.

tasks.description: Enter the data for mortgage interest, state and local taxes (SALT), and charitable giving onto Schedule A.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly inputs all itemized deduction information.

tasks.description: Compare the total itemized deductions to the standard deduction and use the larger amount on the final return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that itemizing provides a greater tax benefit and finalizes the return.
